description: Retrieves information about the status of campaigns, decoder manifests, or state templates associated with a vehicle.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token for the next set of results. If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next set of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value. This parameter is only supported for resources of type CAMPAIGN.

parameters.name: vehicleName
parameters.description: The ID of the vehicle to retrieve information about.

nested_items.name: campaigns
nested_items.description: Lists information about the state of the vehicle with deployed campaigns.

nested_items.name: vehicleName
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the vehicle.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a campaign, which can be one of the following:
CREATED - The campaign has been created successfully but has not been approved.
READY - The campaign has been approved but has not been deployed to the vehicle.
HEALTHY - The campaign has been deployed to the vehicle.
SUSPENDED - The campaign has been suspended and data collection is paused.
DELETING - The campaign is being removed from the vehicle.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.
